doc.title: Lover from Beyond the Grave

composers.composer: Jamie June & The Dead Virgins Society

doc.plot: Homage to Ed Wood and Bela Lugosi!! Stars a warlock named Vincent. He loved his wife Abigail very much, and would have died for her. This all changed one day when he saw her with another man. He vowed to get his revenge! While not succeeding in killing his wife, to his shock, he witnesses the other man kill her! In a jealous rage, he resurrects her corpse from the grave so she can die by his hand! But will he have full control over her body?
